Pre-Game Insights: Australia and Afghanistan will meet for the first time since the 2019 ODI World Cup. Australia faces a must-win situation with fitness concerns over Aaron Finch and Tim David, while Afghanistan aims to end their tournament on a high note after several rain-affected matches.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be broadcasted on Star Sports and Hotstar for Indian viewers.
Others: The match is part of the Super 12 stage of the T20 World Cup 2022.
